xhr.js

XHR (XMLHttpRequest) utility for nodejs, it provides a sort of convenient method to mock a XHR request. For example: 
var xhr = require('node-xhr');

xhr.post({
    url : 'http://localhost:3000/v1/test',
    headers : {
        'Content-Type' : 'application/json',
    },
    params : {
        version : 1,
    },
    body : {
        ...
    };
}, function(err, res) {
    if (err) {
        console.log(err.message);
        return;
    }

    console.log(res.body);
});
Version:
  • 1.0.1
Author:
  • Johnson Lee
